basics.name: Gonzalo Chalé
basics.label: Systems Engineer
basics.summary: This is a starter template web portfolio. It is designed to be a starting point to showcase your work and help you stand out from the crowd. Perfect for developers, designers, and other professionals.

jobs.summary: I worked on the Acme team, where I helped build the Y feature. I was responsible for Z, which involved A, B, and C.
highlights: Developed a new feature for the Acme platform
Worked on the Y project, which involved A, B, and C
Collaborated with the Z team to improve the X platform
